DOC.brief_summary: A treatment with the concept of mitochondrial medication developed by Dr Heinrich Kremer can demonstrably improve and successfully treat actual parameters of Diabetes Mellitus II as well as its risk factors.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of a Regenerative Mitochondrial Medication on Physiological Parameters in Case of Diabetes Mellitus Type II
DOC.criteria: men and women between the ages of 18 and 60 recently diagnosed Diabetes Type II (within the last 12 months) no orallytaken medication up to present no insulin therapy no diseases resulting from diabetes like Nephropathy, Neuropathy, Angiopathy or Retinopathy fasting blood sugar values in the morning under 200mmol sufficient production of insulin
